Description:
Calling all Developers and Investors!
Plenty of choices with this decent sized block of land approximately 710sqm. Renovate, develop (STCA), extend or build your dream home are the options that can be seriously considered with this property. Existing 3 bedroom family home comprises of 3 bedrooms, lounge, dining area, central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry, single garage, carport and a bungalow at the back. This property is located in a very sought after area of Clayton South, only a short stroll to Clayton train station, shops, local schools and beautiful Keeley Park, as well as being only minutes away from Monash University, Monash Hospital and Monash Freeway. So please don't miss out on this unique opportunity for future development and investment, call Rene on 0413 330 357.
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
Insights: 1 Mallawa Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
STYLISH & CHIC TRIPLE STOREY LIVING! VENDOR MUST SELL!
A once in a lifetime opportunity arises to capture this magnificent modern architectural designed masterpiece. This stunning example of stylish living combined with no maintenance is exactly what you are looking for!
Featuring a triple storey 3 bedroom residence comprising of 2 modern bathrooms tiled to the ceiling, open plan kitchen area with quality gas stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, 2 split system air conditioners, and storage cage with secure basement car parking with remote controlled gates. Front landscaped courtyard as well as private viewing balcony completes the pretty picture.
Situated within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre, Clayton Shopping District and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, local schools and parklands, what more could you ask for?

Description:
***UNDER OFFER***
Renovated single level success
A sensational family lifestyle awaits at this beautifully renovated 3 bedroom single level residence brimming with instant appeal from the moment you enter. Gleaming polished hardwood boards and a bright and sunfilled floorplan creates the perfect partnership of contemporary style and comfortable spaces comprising large lounge and dining room and updated kitchen with meals area, tiled bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. A terrific rear garden provides for endless barbeques and gatherings and ample space for children and pets. Presenting an affordable entry point to a family friendly locale with a single garage and workshop -
within close proximity to station, Clayton shopping centre, parklands, local schools and Monash University and Hospital. Land: 537sqm approx.
Clare Rocke : 0412 979 109

Description:
Perfect for Investment, Fully Renovated (Currently under 12 months lease, $350 per week)
This fantastic two bedroom unit will appeal to both the first home buyer and the astute investor. Presenting a rare and perfect opportunity within walking distance to Westall Train Station, minutes drive to Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Central Shopping District, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and IKEA shopping centre.
Featuring: Brand new kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 40mm stone benchtops, new floorboards, open space living, 2 large bedrooms with built-in-robes, new modern central bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, split system in each bedrooms and lounge room, generous size carport and huge private courtyard, perfect for children's play area, entertaining family and friends.
Current rental $350 per week, under 12 months lease.
Don't miss your chance and inspect today!

Description:
As big as a house
First homebuyers, downsizers and investors - here it is! This bright and spacious single villa residence nestled quietly to the rear and just one of two has been designed to maximise space, and keep a low maintenance lifestyle in mind. Only minutes' walk to Clayton shops, station, buses, library, doctors and schools. A spacious living and dining domain is complimented by a solid timber kitchen with stainless steel appliances and casual meals area. 3 large bedrooms with built in robes and ensuite to main, stunning central bathroom with spa, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, solar panels, security alarm, remote single garage and a superb enclosed rear merbau decking/alfresco area with storage underneath, and cafe blinds, perfect for those who love trans-seasonal entertaining.
George Korderas : 0417 521 080

Description:
Dual Occupancy Potential in Prime Location
A great opportunity for a first home buyer, investor or developer to secure this three bedroom home in a fantastic location, within walking distance to local transport, schools, shops and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Westall and Clayton train stations, Monash University and Monash Freeway.
Conveniently positioned on 651sqm approx., the existing dwelling comprising of living room, spacious kitchen with meals area overlooking spacious backyard, offering three bedrooms, family bathroom, separate laundry and oversized single garage.
Live in, rent out or build a townhouse at the back (STCA).
Take advantage of this property with potential and invest in your future.

Description:
Great Family Home to Live in or Invest!
Fantastic opportunity to secure this beautiful family home located within walking distance to Clayton shops, train station, local schools and parks, as well as only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and Monash Freeway. Property comprises wide entry hall opening to formal lounge/dining room, modern and very spacious kitchen with gas cooking, 3 large bedrooms, updated family bathroom with separate toilet and good size laundry. Add to all this a double lock up garage, gas ducted heating, reverse cycle air-conditioning, polished hard wood floors, tiles to wet areas, all on a very good size block of land completes this ideal package. This magnificent property next to beautiful Keeley Park, presents a unique opportunity to live in or invest. For more information call Rene Wrzos on 0413 330 357.
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
SINGLE LEVEL STREET FRONT TOWNHOUSE
This spacious townhouse with its own street frontage and no body corporate, provides an excellent opportunity for the first home buyer or someone who would like to downsize and remain in the Clayton area.
The home has an open plan.
As you enter through the main entrance you will be impressed by the spacious lounge/dining/kitchen area.
From the meals area there is a sliding door that opens out to a very private and secure court yard.
There are three bedrooms all with BIR, a two way bathroom with separate bath and shower.
Separate toilet and laundry.
Internal access via the garage.
Other features include ducted heating, gas cooking and a garden shed.
Just a short walk to Keeley Park, schools, train line, etc.
This is an ideal home to add your own creative style.
Inspection is by private appointment - call (03) 9586 0500 to arrange.
Phillips Nicholson First National

Description:
Dual Occupancy Potential - Under Contract
A great opportunity for first home buyer, investor or developer to secure this 2 bedroom home in a fantastic location within walking distance to local transport, schools, shops and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Clayton or Huntingdale train station (Zone 1), Monash University and Monash Freeway.
Conveniently positioned on 615sqm approx existing dwelling comprising entry hall, large living room opening to formal dining, very spacious kitchen with big meals area overlooking spacious backyard, 2 bedrooms with built in robes, family bathroom, separate laundry and oversized single garage. Live in, rent out or build a townhouse at the back (STCA). Take advantage of this property with potential and invest in your future.
Call Today!

Description:
Calling all Developers, Investors & Renovators
Plenty of options on this large block of land approximately 880sqm.
Attention builders, renovators and developers! Positioned perfectly from an investment perspective, this ideally located allotment with the potential to construct multi-unit townhouses (S.T.C.A) within walking distance from the train station, public transport, Clayton shops and public schools, what more could you want?
Keep the house and build in the back, demolish and build multiple townhouses or simply renovate the home, the choice is yours. With a massive frontage of over 20m and potential multi-unit townhouse development, this property would be your best investment for years to come. Features include: Spacious bedrooms, central bathroom, large kitchen, two sizable living areas, lock-up double garage, heating and evaporative cooling. Your inspection is a must.

Description:
Peaceful, Private and Perfect for Outdoor Entertaining
Hiding in privacy behind a high brick fence in a quiet and pleasant neighbourhood, this family home - maintained in immaculate order - delivers a relaxed lifestyle with the accent on outdoor entertaining. Comfortable and inviting, with low maintenance appeal, the 3-bedroom (2 with built-in wardrobes and 1 with a built-in cabinet) residence has a combined living and dining room leading out to a neat kitchen (gas cooking) that's open to the meals area. The rear garden is set to impress those who love the alfresco way of life. A kidney-shaped solar-heated inground pool is the centre of attention, and a large undercover area houses a built-in bar. Extras include ducted heating, workshop/storeroom, and carport plus extra off-street parking. On an allotment of approx 540sqm, this property is mere minutes from Clarinda shopping centre as well as Clayton South and St Andrews Primary schools, and is convenient to public transport, parks and recreation.
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Description:
AN IMPECCABLE 3 BEDROOM HOME WITH 4 CAR ACCOMMODATION
In amazing condition thanks to caring owners who have not only maintained it during their tenure, but also improved it along the way. Set behind a classic picket fence and red brick faÃ§ade, the home invites with its warm colours and natural light that make you feel right at home. From the entry you are lead into the generous lounge that is complemented by a dining area and a renovated galley style kitchen complete with stainless appliances including a 5 burner gas cook top. There are 3 bedrooms including 2 with built in wardrobes as well as an updated bathroom with ensuite style access from the main bedroom. In addition, you also find the added comforts of ducted heating and evaporative cooling while outside there's a covered patio, very neat backyard and car accommodation to impress the tradesman and car enthusiast alike between the double carport and double garage. Handy to schools, parks, buses and Clarinda Shopping Centre, the home is also within minutes of central Clayton's shops and train station.

Impressive, contemporary style
Welcomed by lush greenery and set behind a gated entry, this stylishly appointed townhouse ensures comfortable, contemporary living superbly situated just moments to Westall train station, Westall Primary and Secondary and a short bus ride to Monash University. A spacious, sun drenched interior offers a free flowing floor plan including modern kitchen with quality appliances and open plan living/dining domain extending out to an inviting courtyard perfect for relaxing and entertaining. Generously sized bedrooms begin with a guest bedroom and designer bathroom preferably positioned on the lower level while upstairs two deluxe bedrooms with tiled ensuites (one with WIR) complete the lavish plan. Delivering unsurpassed luxury featuring study nook, reverse cycle heating/cooling, ample storage, water tank and single carport.

Description:
SOLD BEFORE AUCTION
This is a great opportunity & not to be missed. The 3 bedroom weatherboard home on a 773m2 (approx.) flat block of land has lots of potential. Your choices could be to rent it out, redevelop (STCA), renovate or build your dream home. It offers a neat & tidy presentation, large lounge room with gas heater & split system, spacious kitchen with freestanding gas stove, family bathroom & the bonus of a huge rumpus room. Two of the bedrooms have fully fitted built in robes. There is a large garage & shed. The location is excellent, with buses at the end of the street, Westall primary and secondary schools close by, plus Westall train station & Rosebank Avenue shops are within walking distance. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!
Insights: 4 CULSHAW AVENUE, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
A CLASSIC HOME ON AROUND 704SQM
A much loved family home that has been loved and cared for over many years, it is now time for a new generation to take over and decide the next chapter in this classic home's life. Set on around 704sqm the home is largely original and would be ideally suited to a renovation and update where you can add some modern style and significant value. And if you do this there could still be room in the backyard to build another unit or townhouse (STCA) that would always be in high demand. The home features a separate lounge that links to the meals area and kitchen with gas oven/stove. There are 3 bedrooms and a family bathroom plus a separate toilet and extras including a food preparation room and ducted heating. Outside there is an extensive patio, vegie patch, a garage and separate workshop plus the huge bonus of a water bore and pump. Backing onto Keeley Park the home is also just minutes away from buses, Westall Primary School, Westall Secondary College and central Clayton.
Insights: 34 Mallawa Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Adaptable, entertaining & so close to the park!
Play around in the wide open spaces, dash out to the shops, make an easy commute... stand tall with impressive streetfront style! With a high-impact brick and render facade out front, sun-filled north-facing courtyard garden to the rear, and every luxury in between, this four bedroom, three bathroom, dual zone streetfront home is all about luxury living and a lifestyle location!
Prestige appointed with a European appliance and Stone kitchen and designer bathrooms including a vast double ensuite (with dual vanity and double shower), this high-quality low-maintenance home is fully alarmed, climate controlled by ducted heating plus reverse-cycle air-conditioning, and fitted with a 2000L tank, solar hot water and built-in robes including two WIRs.
Designed for an adaptable and entertaining lifestyle with an ensuite-fitted ground-floor fourth bedroom (also perfect as home-office), this clever home goes beyond traditional formal and family areas with bi-fold-fitted auto-garage - ready to double as an all-weather entertaining area.
Even the location is all about versatility - just 200m from the sporting facilities and recreation facilities of Namatjira Reserve, a walk to Clayton's shops and station for an easy CBD commute and a minute to Monash hospital and University!
Paul Mizerni : 0410 844 955
Insights: 27 other 4 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
A CLASSIC HOME ON AROUND 1,008SQM WITH DEVELOPMENT POTENTIAL (STCA)
Even with a quick inspection of this classic home you can clearly see it has been beautifully maintained throughout its life and its condition is testament to its caring long term owners. Resting on a flat block measuring around 1,008sqm, the home is a prime candidate for further development where you could keep the home and build behind, or simply start from scratch and design a stylish modern unit development (all options are STCA). Behind its pale painted facade you find a warm and inviting home featuring a generous lounge room with gas heater and a split system air conditioner plus a meals area integrated in to the pristine kitchen and a separate study or work area. There are 3 robed bedrooms and a family bathroom that is complemented by a laundry with additional shower facilities and a separate toilet. Outside, you find a large covered patio for entertaining and a massive yard with great potential for tradesmen and hobbyists with the massive 4 car garage plus workshop a great bonus. It's even well positioned with schools and central Clayton's shops, cafes, buses and trains all nearby.
Insights: 35 Manoon Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.
